<section class="fig-layout">

    <img src="images/chat.png" alt="Cashew Chatbot" />

      <article class="lang lang-en" lang="en" aria-live="polite">
        <h2>What is Cashew Chatbot?</h2>
        <p>
          <strong>Cashew Chatbot</strong> is an interactive assistant available on Telegram,
          designed to support cashew farmers, traders, and enthusiasts.  
          It provides quick answers to farming queries, guidance on best agricultural practices,
          market price updates, and tips for increasing yield and quality.
        </p>

        <p>
          Farmers can simply click the chat link or scan the QR code to start
          chatting instantly. The chatbot works 24/7, ensuring that help and
          information are always available, even during busy farming seasons.
        </p>

        <div class="fig-callout" role="note">
          <strong>How to use:</strong>  
          Scan the QR code or click the Telegram link to connect. Ask any cashew-related question and receive instant answers.
        </div>

        <h3>Why use Cashew Chatbot?</h3>
        <ul class="fig-benefits">
          <li><strong>Instant Help:</strong> Get answers in seconds, anytime, anywhere.</li>
          <li><strong>Farming Guidance:</strong> Learn about planting, pest control, and harvesting.</li>
          <li><strong>Market Insights:</strong> Stay updated on market prices and demand.</li>
          <li><strong>Easy Access:</strong> No app installation required—just use Telegram.</li>
          <li><strong>Multilingual:</strong> Support for English and Malayalam conversations.</li>
          <li><strong>Free to Use:</strong> No charges for chatting with the bot.</li>
        </ul>
      </article>
    </section>
  </div>
</section>
